name: Salt Cod In Tomato Sauce
keywords: anchovy fillets, black olives, canned tomatoes, capers, fish, garlic, red pepper, salted cod, main course
recipeIngredient: 1 28-ounce can whole plum tomatoes, drained and chopped
Salt and ground black pepper to taste
1/2 cup pitted black or green olives
Crushed red pepper flakes to taste
1 pound boneless salt cod, soaked overnight, drained and poached 15 minutes

recipeInstructions.text: Combine oil and garlic in a large skillet, and turn heat to medium. Add anchovies, and cook, stirring occasionally, until garlic is lightly golden and anchovies are broken up, less than 5 minutes. Raise heat to medium-high, and add tomatoes, along with a little salt and pepper. Cook a few minutes, stirring occasionally, until tomatoes liquefy.
Add capers, olives, pepper flakes and cod. Cook about 10 minutes, stirring infrequently and gently, until cod is hot. Taste, and adjust seasoning. Garnish, and serve.
